generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with multiple lanes, tram tracks, and road markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, with pedestrians and cyclists present, and they are separated from the road by curbs and poles.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sidewalk and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, with some clouds.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible on the sidewalks, including one walking on the right side of the image.
- car: A white car is visible driving ahead in the middle of the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating no parking is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible above the road, controlling the flow of traffic.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the road, being ridden by a person.
